H0.text: Development of sugar substitutes is not a significant reason why people are living longer today than 100 years ago.

H1.text: Development of medicines is not a significant reason why people are living longer today than 100 years ago.

H2.text: Better health care is not a significant reason why people are living longer today than they were 100â€¯years ago.

H3.text: Better nutrition is not a significant reason why people are living longer today than 100 years ago.

A4.text: Reviews and dietetic professionals have concluded that moderate use of non-nutritive sweeteners as a relatively safe replacement for sugars that can help limit energy intake and assist with managing blood glucose and weight.

A5.text: Sugar substitutes, unlike sugar, do not erode teeth as they are not fermented by the microflora of the dental plaque.

A6.text: The discovery of penicillin in the 20th century by Alexander Fleming provided a vital line of defence against bacterical infections that, without them, often cause patients to suffer prelonged recovery periods and highly increased chances of death.

A7.text: Its discovery and application within medicine allowed previously impossible treatments to take place, including cancer treatments, organ transplants, to open heart surgery.
